note:
Erst Physiker, dann Quanteninformatiker, dann Versicherungsmathematiker, jetzt: Professor für Data Science @ Hochschule Harz, außerdem: Sci-Fi-Autor, Vater, Ehemann, Nerd. Privater Account.

Physicist who became a Quantum Information Theorist who became an Insurance Mathematician who became Professor of Data Science @ Harz University of Applied Sciences Wernigerode, also: sci-fi author, father, husband, nerd - private account.

Toots in Deutsch and English.

fields.name: AI Scraping
fields.value: I do not consent to the use of my content for any AI training purposes.
